group_1.narration: After we finished buying all the material we needed@to make our costumes for the Halloween Contest,@we started making them right away.
After my friends helped me with parts that I struggled@with and I helped them with other parts and@stuff in turn, our costumes were finally done!

group_1.textCenter: Fufu, I wonder if this looks okay...?

group_1.textLeft: You'll give me a heart attack if@you just barge in here like that!

group_1.textRight: Hey wait, is that for Halloween? Lookin' good!!

group_1.textLeft: This is the costume I'm going to wear@for the upcoming Halloween Contest.

group_1.textRight: It looks really good on you, Kako!
But... wasn't that Halloween Contest cancelled...?

group_1.narration: The Halloween Contest that everyone in the shopping@district had been planning out had been cancelled.
The construction of the stage and preparations@couldn't be done in time. On top of that,@there weren't enough participants...

group_1.textCenter: (I absolutely can't let things end like this...)
(Not just for myself, but for the sake of everyone@who helped me make this costume...!)

group_1.narration: Emiri-san, Natsuki-san and I split up and went around@the shops in the shopping district to ask@that they cooperate and support Halloween.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see, so that's what this stamp is for.

group_1.textRight: Yes! Can I count on you to...?

group_1.textLeft: Sure! Since you're the one asking, Kako-chan.

group_1.textRight: If customers come dressed up in costumes,@I'd like you to give them candy!
You don't have to give them the expensive kinds.
Small candies or chocolates will be just fine...

group_1.textLeft: Sure. I can't do much, but if that's all@I have to do, then I'll help too.

group_1.textRight: Ohhhh, if MagiKari shows up,@then let me know!

group_1.textLeft: Who's that? Um... that MagiKari@girl you're talking about?

group_1.textRight: Uhhh, she's like a super uber Halloween@tier sparkly girl~~...

group_1.narration: We got everyone in the shopping district@to promise that they'd help out. And finally,@tomorrow's Halloween itself...!
